title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-1.8 - Follow-up review, tracking and educational activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-1.8 - Follow-up review, tracking and educational activities

State Regulations

The testing laboratory may: (a) request case follow-up information from hospitals, birth attendants, responsible providers and specialty care centers; (b) record diagnoses and case follow-up information; (c) maintain tracking records on identified cases; and
(d) provide educational activities and materials. Notes

69-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
